org.mixare.mgr.location

Interface LocationFinder


  • public interface LocationFinder
    This class is repsonsible for finding the location, and sending it back to the mixcontext.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  LocationFinder.LocationFinderState
      Possible status of LocationFinder

      Finds the location through the providers
      Location getCurrentLocation()
      Returns the current location.
      GeomagneticField getGeomagneticField()

      Gets the location that was used in the last download for datasources.
      LocationFinder.LocationFinderState getStatus()
      Status of service
      void locationCallback(java.lang.String provider)
      A working location provider has been found: check if the found location has the best accuracy.
      void setDownloadManager(DownloadManager downloadManager)
      Set the DownloadManager manager at this service
      void setLocationAtLastDownload(Location locationAtLastDownload)
      Sets the property to the location with the last successfull download.
      void switchOff()
      Request to deactive the service
      void switchOn()
      Request to active the service
